attributes.action: UK Goverment to Deliever Promise Of New Powers being granted to Hollyrood in the event of a NO Vote.
attributes.additional_details: Scotland has voted to remain within the UK Kingdom, and has been promised by all three Westminster Parties, new powers being granted to Hollyrood in the event of a NO vote... This petition has been created to make sure all three parties follow up on their promises, and everyone gets a fair deal as promised by Mr Cameron.
